pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![](https://codecov.io/gh/nickderobertis/py-mixins/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/nickderobertis/pymixins)# py-mixins## OverviewMixin classes which may be added to your own classes to add certain functionality to them.## Getting StartedInstall `mixins`:```pip install mixins```A simple example:```pythonimport mixins# Do something with mixins```## LinksSee the[documentation here.](https://nickderobertis.github.io/py-mixins/)## AuthorCreated by Nick DeRobertis. MIT License.
